meanings.definition: The object of a person's ambition or effort.
meanings.sent1: Her goals include becoming a doctor and helping others.
meanings.sent2: He scored a goal in the soccer match.
meanings.sent3: Setting goals helps keep us motivated and focused.
meanings.sent4: Her goal of reaching the mountain top seemed impossible at first.
meanings.sent5: The team celebrated when they achieved their goal of winning the championship.

meanings.definition: The result or achievement toward which effort is directed.
meanings.sent1: The company's goals for the year were to increase sales by 20%.
meanings.sent2: She reached her weight loss goal after months of hard work.
meanings.sent3: His goal of finishing the race first was dashed when he tripped and fell.
meanings.sent4: The goal of finding a cure for cancer drives many scientists in their research.
meanings.sent5: The team celebrated reaching their fundraising goal for the charity event.

meanings.sent1: Her goal for the project was to create a sustainable solution.
meanings.sent2: The team discussed their goals for the upcoming season.
meanings.sent3: His goal of learning a new language led him to enroll in classes.
meanings.sent4: The goal of the meeting was to brainstorm ideas for the new campaign.
meanings.sent5: Setting clear goals helps us stay on track and measure progress.
